message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $90.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking of a price around $85. Would you be willing to consider that?
I understand your offer of $85, but I'm still not sure if that's enough for me. I'm willing to compromise and sell the product to you for $92.
I'm still a bit above my budget, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. How about we settle on $87?
I understand you're trying to meet me halfway, but I'm still not willing to go that low. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $95.
I'm getting close to my budget, but I'm still not comfortable with $95. Can you do $89?
I understand you're getting close to your budget, but I'm still not willing to go that low. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $91.
I'm really close to my budget, but I'm still not sure about $91. Can you do $88?
I understand you're really close to your budget, but I'm still not willing to go that low. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $90.
